info.author: Florian Roeckl
info.description: determines the best match(es) of insertion consensus sequences and sequences of a sequence assembly to extract the insertion sequences.
info.paperDescription: assemblyAnalyzer was used to extract the sequence of insertions that were previously predicted with the SV caller. It therefore identified the best pair(s) of consensus sequences and assembled sequences.

param.name: fasta
param.description: Fasta file generated by SPAdes assembler.

param.name: sam
param.description: SAM file containing consensus sequences mapped to fasta file.

param.name: out
param.description: Output fasta file containing detected insertion sequences

param.name: maxSize
param.description: [optional] Maximum length for an insertion. Detected insertions with greater length are discarded.

param.name: ignoreFastaExistence
param.description: Do not throw an error if fasta file does not exist
